context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review: For people with fertility issues,gunasheela is the place to go.This is a age old hospital and doctors here are really committed to bring happiness to childless couple.Ours was a very high risk case where even we were aware that the chances of conceiving is very minimal...But the effort taken by the doctors (Dr.Devika,Dr.Rajam,Dr.Vasant) and the embryologist is truly truly commandable...Dr.Rajam is the most optimistic doctor who will make you believe that things will happen good ....she gives personal attention to details and explains everything to the patient.In my case if it had been any other hospital they would never have put in the effort of what Gunasheela did.my only recommendation is that like female infertility issues,male infertility issues are also at raise in India.it is important to have on board a experiences andrologist to discuss male infertility issues.this will help the hospital and the patients to walk the miles further ahead.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
